title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.15 - Requirements for commercial egg-producing poultry flocks identified for testing by trace-outs from flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 57.15 - Requirements for commercial egg-producing poultry flocks identified for testing by trace-outs from flocks found positive for salmonella enteritidis

State Regulations

Commercial egg-producing poultry flocks identified for
testing by trace-outs from flocks found positive for Salmonella enteritidis
shall be tested, evaluated and managed as provided in 9 CFR parts
71
and
82. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
57.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
